problem: 如图,直线CD与线段AB为直径的圆相切于点D,并交BA的延长线于点C,且AB=6,AD=3,P点在切线CD上移动．当∠APB的度数最大时,则∠ABP的度数为()
answer: 解:连接BD,PA,∵直线CD与以线段AB为直径的圆相切于点D,∴∠ADB=90°,当∠APB的度数最大时,则P和D重合,∴∠APB=90°,∵AB=6,AD=3,∴sin∠DBA=\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{1}{2},∴∠ABP=30°,∴当∠APB的度数最大时,∠ABP的度数为30°．故选:D．
comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,圆周角定理以及解直角三角形的有关知识,解题的关键是由题意可知当P和D重合时,∠APB的度数最大为90°．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line CD is tangent to the circle whose line segment AB is the diameter at point D, and intersects the extended line line of BA at point C, and AB = N_0, AD = N_1, point P moves on the tangent line CD. When the degree of ∠APB is the largest, then the degree of ∠ABP is ()
